string.name: welcome_text
string.p: NOVA-script: a simplified scripting language for bot control.\n
\nThe basic syntax requires that individual instructions are contained on a single line.
\nThere are no terminal characters and indentation is irrelevant.
\nNOVA-script works on the basis of tags, which means that loops, conditional statements and functions must have start and end tags.

string.name: syntax_text
string.p: \n\nTags determine the start and end of groups of instructions such as loops, conditional statements and functions.
\nIn the previous example, if the variable a is greater than or equal to 10, its value is changed to 0.
